General.Name: Shenzhen Topway Video Communication Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Topway Video Communication Co., Ltd. constructs, operates, and maintains cable television (TV) networks that provide cable TV viewing and related value-added services in Shenzhen, China. It also offers cable broadband, program transmission, and video shopping services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Shenzhen, China. Shenzhen Topway Video Communication Co., Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Shenzhen Media Group Co. Ltd.

6.Name: Mr. Yang  Lin
6.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director
